meanings.definition: In a manner relating to the combined effects of electricity and magnetism.
meanings.sent1: The toy car moved electromagnetically towards the magnet.
meanings.sent2: The particles were attracted electromagnetically to the charged plate.
meanings.sent3: The robot danced electromagnetically to the rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent4: The students' excitement was drawn electromagnetically to the upcoming science fair.
meanings.sent5: The lightning struck electromagnetically, illuminating the night sky.

meanings.definition: Using or produced by the interaction of electric and magnetic fields.
meanings.sent1: The electromagnetically powered train zoomed along the tracks.
meanings.sent2: The electromagnetically shielded room protected sensitive equipment.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's suit was electromagnetically charged, giving him special abilities.
meanings.sent4: The city's futuristic transportation system operated electromagnetically.
meanings.sent5: The electromagnetically locked door prevented unauthorized access.
